mapper.update: insert into orders(member_id, item_id, quantity) values(#{memberId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select c.order_id, a.name as membername, b.name as itemname, b.sale_price, c.quantity, (c.quantity*b.sale_price) as total from members a, items b, orders c where a.member_id = c.member_id and b.item_id = c.item_id
